description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Worker_DocumentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Worker_DocumentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Worker_DocumentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to the worker document.

Worker_Document_Data.description: The ID for the worker document.
The name of the worker document file.
A comment about the worker document.

Document_Category__All_ObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Document_Category__All_Object.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Worker_Document_Data.description: The category that the worker document is for.

validation.validation: The category "[cat]" is inactive and cannot be used.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
